Package views.dialogs

package views.dialogs
Contains all the dialog components of the application
See Also:
  • JDialog
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    views
    Contains all the interface components of the application.
    views.panels
    Contains all the panels of the application
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractExamDialog
    An abstract class for exams dialogs.
    AddComposedExamDialog
    Implements a dialog for adding composed exams to the exams table.
    AddSimpleExamDialog
    Implements a dialog for adding simple exams to the exams table.
    FilterDialog
    Implements a dialog to set a filter on exams table.
    HistogramDialog
    Implements a dialog for displaying statistics about grade of exams present in exam table.
    ModifyComposedExamDialog
    Implements a dialog for modifying composed exams to the exams table.
    ModifyExamDialogInterface
    A simple interface used in DoubleClickOnEntryListener in order to use polymorphism
    ModifySimpleExamDialog
    Implements a dialog for modifying simple exams to the exams table.
